REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Chieftain
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was the chief of HIS tribe unit it was wiped out by raiders. Now HE wanders the Rimworld waiting for a chance at revenge.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medieval lord
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is a noble lord. HE has decided to wander the rimworld to test HIS mettle against this harsh world before returning to lead HIS people.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Senator
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is an exiled senator. HIS political enemies came for HIM one night and HE was forced to flee. HE hopes to build a following on this new world and return for vengeance when possible.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Gang leader
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was an urbworld gang leader. HE left his crew behind when HE was betrayed. NAME hopes to start a new gang on this forsaken world and rise to be its crime kingpin.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Governor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a governor on this rimworld until his colony was overrun by raiders. Now HE wanders the Rimworld waiting for a chance at revenge.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Union boss
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a union boss on a caveworld. HE has decided to dedicate HIS life to supporting the rights of the workers in the outer rim.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Combat engineer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is a combat engineer. HE knows how to build structures as well as how to tear them down. Now NAME has decided to put HIS skills to use helping to build and defend a colony on the outer rim.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Sheriff
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is a sheriff of the outer rim. HE is responsible for enforcing the loose semblance of law that this world has.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Assassin
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is an urbworld assassin dedicated to eliminating HIS targets. HE has tracked one of them to this rimworld and HE will kill anyone who gets in HIS way.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Trapper
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a tribal trapper in charge of bringing food to HIS tribe until one day HE was the one who was trapped and sold off to the highest bidder. Now NAME is far from home.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medieval archer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a Medieval archer. Tired of war HE hung up HIS bow and snuck aboard a spaceship. Now NAME utilizes HIS talents defending and feeding the outer rim.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Drop pod trooper
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a glitterworld drop pod trooper. A machine of death and destruction HE saw the end of many worlds. Now after many years of destroying HE has traveled to the outer rim to help build something.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medicine man
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is a tribal medicine man. HE was exiled from HIS tribe for HIS outlandish ideas and now travels the outer rim healing those HE comes across.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medieval alchemist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was exiled from HIS lord's court when HE failed to turn lead into gold. Now NAME travels the outer rim searching for a greater understanding of the elements.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Glitterworld surgeon
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a glitterworld surgeon. HE saved countless lives. However NAME knew that HE could do more good somewhere lacking a doctor with HIS skills, so he traveled to the outer rim to make a real difference.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Black market butcher
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is a black market butcher. HE deals with reclaiming organs from illegal sources for a variety of purposes. NAME has traveled to the outer rim to avoid the long reach of the law.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Field medic
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is a field medic, able to save lives in even the roughest environments. There are few proper hospitals in the outer rim so NAME has learned to triage and treat patients in the field. Due to the lawlessness of the outer rim HE has also learned how to use a gun.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Fungus cultivator
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is fungus cultivator, a grower of food and medicine for his caveworld. HE knows which mushrooms heal, which mushrooms are tasty and which mushrooms kill.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Weaver
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is a tribal weaver. While HIS crafts are primitive nobody can deny HIS artistic talents.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medieval sculptor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is medieval sculptor. HE assists in the building of grand buildings and HIS statues are famous across HIS home world. Now NAME tours the outer rim leaving HIS mark on this wild, untamed place.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Holographic designer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is glitterworld holographic designer. HE creates amazing holographic pieces of art that are famous across the galaxy. Looking for inspiration NAME has traveled to the outer rim.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Graffiti artist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is an urbworld graffiti artist. HE is almost as skilled with a gun as HE is with a spray-can as tagging rival territory is dangerous business. NAME has decided to leave his mark on the outer rim.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Taxidermist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is an taxidermist in the outer rim. HE takes animal carcasses and turns them into stunning works of art.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Cave painter
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is a cave painter. HE spent HIS time creating brilliant pieces of art on his caveworld. However only very few of the inhabitants of his home world has an appreciation for art. NAME left for the outer rim to seize the acknowledgment for HIS craft HE has always known HE deserves.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Hunter and gatherer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a hunter and gatherer responsible for supplying HIS tribe with a diverse range of foods. One day HE returned to find HIS people slaughtered by raiders. Now NAME seeks vengeance.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medieval farmer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a medieval farmer. Although HE was a very capable grower NAME always knew that HE was destined for more. Now HE lends HIS hands in taming the wild outer rim.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Horticulture expert
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a horticulture expert on HIS glitterworld. Creating gardens was as much an art-form there as a practical pursuit. Now NAME seeks to spread beauty and greenery across the outer rim.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Smokeleaf cultivator
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was one of the best smokeleaf cultivators on HIS crowded urbworld. Eventually a rival organization threatened his life and he fled to the outer rim.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Frontier farmer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Farming the outer rim is as dangerous an occupation as any. NAME has survived animal attacks, raiders and crop failures. HE continues to try to eek out a living on this harsh planet.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Bug breeder
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Farms on a caveworld look very different to farms on most other worlds. Caveworld growers like NAME need to be able to grow a large variety of lichens and mosses to breed bugs for protein. NAME has decided to explore the outer rim to find new plants and insects to take back to HIS home world one day.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Tribal scout
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is a tribal scout. HE is responsible for searching out new lands and new ideas, before bringing them back to the tribe. HE has learned a variety of skills to act independently while away from HIS tribe. One day NAME will return to HIS tribal world with HIS new knowledge.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medieval inventor
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME constantly pushed the boundaries of scientific achievement on HIS home world, inventing many ingenious contraptions. Eventually though HE knew that in order to learn more he would have to pack up HIS workshop and travel the stars. Now NAME experiments in the outer rim.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Theoretical scientist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME has a very deep knowledge of complex scientific concepts. A true genius, HE has decided that in order to further HIS knowledge HE needs to explore the very limits of civilization. Whether NAME will survive or not, only time will tell.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Chemist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was responsible for the creation of many medical and recreational drugs on HIS crowded urbworld. Eventually NAME decided to explore the outer rim to find even more potent reagents for HIS concoctions.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Tinkerer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The resources required to fabricate new technology are sometimes hard to come by in the outer rim. NAME takes existing inventions and tinkers with them to discover improvements. HE has almost blown HIMself up on multiple occasions.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Geologist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was responsible for researching the different rock and mineral types on HIS caveworld. Now HE explores the geology of the outer rim.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Digger
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a tribal digger. HE was responsible for moving large amounts of earth in order to create primitive buildings or farmland.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medieval miner
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a miner on his medieval home world. HE is comfortable deep within the earth, pick in hand. NAME has traveled to the outer rim to strike it rich.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Asteroid excavator
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was an asteroid excavator, shattering asteroids for HIS glitterworld to get to the precious resources inside. Now NAME uses HIS knowledge of minerals to exploit planets on the outer rim.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Sewer runner
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a sewer runner on HIS crowded urbworld. HE ran through the underground tunnels underneath the cities exploring. Now HE uses HIS talents to help explore the outer rim.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Prospector
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is a prospector of the outer rim. HIS job is to find and exploit valuable mineral deposits.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Tunneler
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a tunneler on his caveworld home. HE was a natural at tunneling beneath the surface and scouting out valuable minerals. Now NAME lends his experience to colonies on the outer rim for coin.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Fire tender
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a tribal fire tender. The position of fire tender is highly valued in tribal society for fires multitude of uses.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medieval butcher
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a medieval butcher. HE knows HIS way around a cleaver which is both useful in the kitchen and on the battlefield.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Gastronomical artisan
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a gastronomical artisan. HE turned cooking into an art form on HIS glitterworld home.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Brewer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was an urbworld brewer. HE knows how to make a variety of different alcoholic beverages, a highly sought after skill in the outer rim.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Frontier chef
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is a frontier chef in the outer rim. HE cooks delicious meals, just don't ask what's in them!

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Nutrient paste cook
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a nutrient paste cook for HIS caveworld home. HE knows how to cook meals from limited ingredients that while not delicious can sustain a person.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Hut maker
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a tribal hut maker. HE explores the rimworld in the search of better building techniques for HIS tribe.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medieval mason
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a medieval mason. HE knows how to construct beautiful stone structures.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: High rise architect
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a high rise architect. HE has an excellent knowledge of engineering.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Urban planner
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was an urban planner. HE has an excellent knowledge of construction.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Settler
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is a settler on the outer rim. HE knows a variety of useful skills needed to tame this wild land.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Warren builder
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a warren builder on his caveworld home. HE knows how to dig homes out of the very earth.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Tool maker
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a tribal tool maker. HE has the knowledge to create useful tools.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medieval blacksmith
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is a medieval blacksmith. HE knows how to forge both weapons and armor.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Roboticist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a roboticist. HE worked on creating complex robots for a variety of different purposes.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Forger
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was an urbworld forger. HE can forge a variety of different goods.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Gunsmith
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is a gunsmith. HE can forge a variety of different guns.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Artificer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is a caveworld artificer. HE can create a variety of different tools and weapons out of exotic materials.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Herder
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a tribal herder. HE knows how to tame and take care of animals.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Stable master
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a medieval stable master. HE knows how to breed and take care of animals.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Zoologist
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is a glitterworld zoologist. HE wanders the outer rim documenting the various exotic animals.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Illegal breeder
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was an illegal urbworld breeder. HE bred exotic and dangerous animals for a premium.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Rancher
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is an outer rim rancher. HE breeds and takes care of exotic rimworld animals.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Mole rat farmer
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a caveworld mole rat farmer. HE bred moles in the depths of the earth to feed HIS people.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Tribal warrior
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is a tribal warrior. HE is fierce looking with HIS tribal tattoos and HE knows how to use a variety of melee weapons to maim and kill.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Medieval knight
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is a medieval knight. HE believes in chivalry and honor. NAME has traveled to the outer rim to obtain the glory HE knows is HIS destiny.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Peacekeeper
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is a glitterworld peacekeeper. HE is in charge of keeping the peace all over the galaxy. Right now NAME is stationed in the outer rim.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Riot police
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was an urbworld member of the riot police. HE was in charge of ensuring that the people of HIS urbworld respected the law.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Bar owner
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME is a bar owner in the outer rim. HE knows how to cook and how to crack the occasional raider skull.

REB_Code.BackstoryDef.title: Strike breaker
REB_Code.BackstoryDef.baseDesc: NAME was a strike breaker on the caveworld HE called home. HE learned how to both talk HIS way out of trouble and how to crack some skulls when talking didn't work.
